title: Across from the OCEAN! Panoramic OCEAN views - 1bedroom, Heat included
map_address: 285 Lynn Shore Drive, Lynn MA near Ocean
posting_body: COMPLETELY RENOVATED Oceanfront living with an ocean view in the Diamond District!
The Breakers DIRECTLY across from King's Beach!
1919 Classical Revival elevator building w/three miles of beaches along Lynn/Nahant Beach Reservations.
Simplify your life and enjoy affordable living in this stylishly modern one-bedroom apartment.
This cheerfully bright and sunny apartment has hardwood floors, high ceilings, in door laundry.
Walkable to the Lynn Commuter Rail for a 20 minute train ride to Boston.
Walkable to both Lynn and Swampscott downtowns w/popular restaurants, bakeries, brewery, bars, galleries, farmer's markets, world class public art, stunning architecture & more!
Hike nearby majestic Lynn Woods or bike on The Northern Strand Bike Trail from Lynn to Boston.
WILL BE COMPLETELY RENOVATED BY AUGUST 1ST
